amendment.description: Amendments en bloc sought to exempt from the provisions of the bill Federal clean air laws and regulations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment (comprised of amendments numbered 112 and 115 as printed in the Congressional Record) to provide that the bill would not apply to any laws or regulations pertaining to air pollution abatement or control.

action.text: On agreeing to the Skaggs amendments (A005) Failed by voice vote.
